name: Stickman Spider -Rope Hero Sim
description:
Hello buddies! Are you ready to take thrill along with your stickman hero? If yes then warm welcome you in this stunning contest of spider fighting on sizzling Vegas crime city environment. Be the spider hero and start fight with multiple warriors that are trying to destroy the peace of the city. Amazing tasks to accomplish for stickman hero and save their city from huge destruction. Enhance your hero skills and kill multiple gangster in the city of crime. Ultimate hero tasks to accomplish on limited time duration and wins that hero fight to increase your capabilities. Take adventurous fun during fight with warriors and get back the peace of the city.

** Key Features **
• Amazing animation of spiders & visual sounds effects
• Easy to play but hard to become champion of this contest
